channel.description: Update an SSO OIDC integration with OIN Manager Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 775 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Saas Builder Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-sso-app/ (Update your published integration) Page type: Task Content type: How-to without code A “How-to without code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
